title: User login with correct credentials and two-factor authentication
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username/email and password followed by successful two-factor authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that the system prompts for two-factor authentication.
Enter valid two-factor authentication code.
Confirm that the user is successfully logged in and redirected according to their role.

title: User login fails with invalid credentials
description: Ensure that login fails and appropriate error messages are shown when invalid username/email or password are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that an error message for invalid credentials is displayed and login is denied.

title: Prevent duplicate patient registration with existing CPF
description: Verify that the system does not allow registering a new patient with a duplicate CPF number.

steps.description: Navigate to the New Patient registration form.
Input patient details with a CPF that already exists in the system.
Attempt to save the patient record.
Verify that the system prevents saving and shows a duplicate CPF error message.

title: Schedule single appointment without conflict
description: Verify that scheduling a new appointment is successful when there is no conflict with existing appointments.

steps.description: Open the appointment scheduling interface.
Select a date and time slot where no other appointment is booked for the assigned therapist.
Fill in patient and appointment details.
Save the new appointment.
Confirm that the appointment is successfully saved and appears in the schedule.

title: Prevent scheduling appointment conflicts
description: Validate that the system blocks scheduling of new appointments that would conflict with existing ones on the same date/time and resource.

steps.description: Open the appointment scheduling interface.
Choose date and time already occupied by an existing appointment for the same therapist.
Attempt to save the appointment.
Verify that the system rejects the appointment and displays a scheduling conflict message.

title: Create recurring appointments with conflict detection
description: Ensure that recurring appointments can be created without conflict, and conflicts are properly detected and reported.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment scheduling with recurrence options.
Define recurring appointment parameters (e.g., weekly on Mondays for 4 weeks).
Select time slots and patient details.
Save the recurring appointments.
Verify that all recurring appointments are created unless conflicts exist.
If conflicts are detected, confirm warnings and prevention of conflicting occurrences.

title: Use AI Assistant to generate clinical report with accuracy and relevance
description: Verify that the AI assistant generates clinical reports maintaining at least 95% accuracy and clinical relevance against input data.

steps.description: Input valid patient clinical data in the documentation section.
Request AI assistant to generate clinical report.
Confirm that the generated report is returned within 10 seconds.
Validate that the report content matches clinical data and suggestions with at least 95% accuracy.

title: Edit and autosave clinical SOAP notes with version control
description: Verify that the rich text SOAP editor autosaves changes, allows editing, and maintains version history for clinical notes.

steps.description: Open existing patient SOAP note in editor.
Make changes to the note content.
Confirm autosave triggers periodically without data loss.
Access version history of the SOAP note.
Confirm that previous versions are available and can be restored.

title: Patient portal secure login and data encryption compliance
description: Verify that patient portal secure login enforces role-based access, two-factor authentication, and data encryption complies with LGPD.

steps.description: Navigate to patient portal login and enter valid credentials.
Complete two-factor authentication.
Confirm secure HTTPS connection during login and data transmission.
Access patient data and perform operations (view prescriptions, pain diary).
Verify that data is encrypted in transit and at rest as per compliance.

title: Verify system performance benchmarks under load
description: Test system responsiveness with 100 concurrent users, verify page load times under 2 seconds and AI queries respond within 10 seconds.

steps.description: Simulate 100 concurrent users performing a mix of common operations including login, scheduling, and AI report requests.
Verify all pages load within 2 seconds.
Confirm AI query responses complete within 10 seconds.

title: Backup and disaster recovery system test
description: Validate backup process integrity and successful data recovery after simulated system failure.

steps.description: Trigger system backup process.
Confirm backup completes successfully and backups are stored securely.
Simulate data loss or system failure.
Initiate data recovery from backup.
Verify data integrity and system functionality post-recovery.

title: Audit log records all access and modification events
description: Ensure audit logs capture details of all user access, data modifications, and configuration changes with timestamps and user IDs.

steps.description: Login as different user roles and perform various CRUD operations on patient records, scheduling, and financial data.
Verify audit logs contain accurate and complete event records with user and timestamp information.

title: Responsive design verification on mobile, tablet and desktop
description: Confirm the UI renders properly and is fully functional on varying device screen sizes including mobile phones, tablets, and desktop browsers.

steps.description: Access key system pages (login, patient portal dashboard, scheduling, AI assistant) from devices or emulators with different screen sizes.
Verify layout adapts correctly without horizontal scroll, content is accessible and UI components function as expected.

title: Appointment notifications sent correctly
description: Ensure that appointment-related notifications are triggered and sent for created, updated, and cancelled appointments via system and WhatsApp integration.

steps.description: Create a new appointment and confirm patient and therapist receive notification.
Update an existing appointment time and confirm notifications are triggered.
Cancel an appointment and verify cancellation notifications are sent.
Check WhatsApp messages and system notifications are correctly received and formatted.

title: Teleconsultation system establishes video and audio connection successfully
description: Verify teleconsultation session can be initiated and maintains stable WebRTC video and audio communication between therapist and patient.

steps.description: Login as therapist and patient.
Schedule and start a teleconsultation session.
Confirm that both video and audio streams are established without delay or interruption.
Test reconnection handling if network drops temporarily.
Verify teleconsultation automatically recovers connection or provides proper error feedback.

title: Financial transaction records creation and report generation
description: Verify creation of financial transactions, their correct storage, and accurate report generation with export options.

steps.description: Create a new financial transaction with required details.
Save the transaction.
Confirm the transaction appears in the transaction list.
Generate financial reports for a given period.
Verify report data is accurate and export functionality works (PDF, Excel).

title: Inventory stock alerts trigger correctly
description: Validate that inventory items with low stock or expiry triggers alert notifications in the inventory dashboard.

steps.description: Set stock levels for items and reduce quantity to below alert threshold.
Confirm that low stock alert is displayed.
Set expiry date of an item to near future.
Verify expiry warning is shown on the dashboard.

title: Exercise prescription personalization and tracking
description: Verify exercise library allows personalized exercise prescription and that patients can track progress in their portal.

steps.description: Select exercises from the library and prescribe them to a patient with customization.
Confirm prescription is saved and visible in the patient's portal.
Patient logs in to their portal and updates exercise progress.
Verify progress is recorded and reflects on patient dashboard.

title: Mentoring system tracks intern activities and statistics
description: Test the mentoring system records intern sessions, case lists, and provides mentor reports on engagement.

steps.description: Login as mentor and view intern cases and session logs.
Add notes and update mentoring session details.
Verify that intern activity is logged and mentoring statistics update accordingly.

title: Group management supports patient group creation and session scheduling
description: Validate creation of patient groups, scheduling group sessions, and proper UI display of group info.

steps.description: Create a new patient group with assigned patients.
Schedule a group therapy session.
Confirm the group and session details are correctly saved and reflected in schedules.
